cal_devices.label:
CALIBRATE MY DASHBOARD for the following devices:
FOR STOCK DEVICE DISPLAY DPI SETTINGS ONLY

cal_devices_2col.label:
FORCE DISPLAY 2 COLUMNS WIDE (when held vertically)
FOR STOCK DEVICE DISPLAY DPI SETTINGS ONLY

zoomy.label: Add ZOOMY (This checkbox will uncheck itself after update)

text.default: <small>Temporarily add a calibration helper tile to generate the perfect css for alignment of columns to the edge of the screen on any device, any device display dpi setting.</small>
Regardless of whether there is overflow, scrollbars will be enabled but hidden. Recommended when using header mods.

header.label: Header Theme
header.text: Change the size and position and visibility of the dashboard header..

text.default:
Comma-delimited breakpoints. Example: '20, 45' is [CRITICAL 1-20], [WARNING 21-45] then OK for everything above.
red_end, yellow_end
Change the color of all Temperature tiles based on the temperature value.

chroma_humidity.label: Enable value-based humidity tile color globally.

text.default: Change the color of all Humidity tiles based on the humidity value.
Add parallax vertical scroll effect for dashboard background.

label.label: Add/Replace Label
label.type: For image and video tiles, this will add a highly visible label. For others this will replace the existing label.

text.default: Nudge the icon slightly to give it more space..
text.attribute: Nudge the icon away from the value slightly to give it more space..
text.links: Nudge the icon away from the value slightly to give it more space..

text.default: For attribute tiles, this will add your custom unit label immediately after the tile value.
This is normally used to increase attribute tile font size to match temperature, humidity and other numeric-based tile types.
Set the alignment of the title.
text.texttile: Set the horizontal alignment of the text.

text.default: Adjust the height and vertical alignment of the tile.
For some tiles, you'll want to change the title color to make it more visible.
Make everything within the tile x times larger.
text.thermostat: Make everything within the thermostat tile x times larger.
text.attribute: Make the content of this tile x times larger while keeping the title the same size.

text.default: Make the entire tile a touch slider.
Adjust the layout of the touch slider.
Change the layout of this tile to be more button-like.
text.dashboard: Change the layout of this Dashboard Link to be a stacked large icon and small text.
text.links: Change the layout of this Links tile to stack the icon above the text and make icon large.

text.default: Hide the text, only show the icon.
The tile text and icon color (overrides state colors).  Format: rgba(x,x,x,x).
The tile background color (overrides state colors).  Format: rgba(x,x,x,x).
The tile border color.  FormatL: rgba(x,x,x,x).
The width (in pixels) of the tile border.  Border Color required to see it.
Warning: may not work well with Buttonize mod.
Remove the title and attempt to center the contents of the tile vertically.

chroma_battery.label: Custom value-based color for this tile

text.default:
Comma-delimited breakpoints. Example: "20, 45" is [CRITICAL 1-20], [WARNING 21-45] then OK for everything above.
red_end, yellow_end

chroma_temperature.label: Custom value-based gradient for this tile

text.default:
Comma-delimited gradient index values. Default values:
-30,15,32,33,70,90,100,120 F
-30,-10,0,1,20,30,40,50 C
purple,blue,blue_end,green_start,green,yellow,orange,red

chroma_humidity.label: Enable value-based humidity tile color for this tile.

text.default: Change the color of this tile based on the humidity value.

Enable Life360 Status CSS Patching
Select a color theme.
Check to remove the Life360 logo.

tm.label: BPT Tile Master CSS Patching

text.default: Enable some basic CSS patches for BPT Tile Master tiles to look good in smartly..
